message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Your share is worth less next round. Let's be reasonable. I take a slight majority.
I'll take a bit less than before, but still more than you offered
This is a serious offer, Alice. Time is running out for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Don't let greed make us both lose!
